predictions.text: By 2025-11-14, the U.S. federal government shutdown will end via an enacted CR or appropriations bill signed by the President.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation on congress.gov or whitehouse.gov of a funding measure signed into law on or before 2025-11-14 that restores federal appropriations (ending the lapse).
monitoring_signals: House Rules Committee posts rule for CR
Senate cloture and final passage votes scheduled
White House Statement of Administration Policy indicating signature intent
predictions.rationale: Senate advancing a bipartisan deal increases near-term odds of passage; leadership signaling suggests quick enactment.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will announce at least one new Iran-related sanctions designation via a Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: A press release on home.treasury.gov naming Iran, the IRGC, or Iran-linked entities/persons under new/additional sanctions by 2025-11-30.
predictions.rationale: Recent regional developments and routine cadence of Iran designations make at least one action likely this month.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, FDA/CDER will remove the boxed warning from labeling of at least one menopausal hormone therapy (MHT) product.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official FDA Drug Safety Communication or approved labeling supplement shows elimination of the “Boxed Warning” for at least one estrogen/progestin MHT on DailyMed or FDA site by 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: DailyMed label updates for major MHT brands
Statements from medical societies referencing label changes
predictions.rationale: Reporting indicates FDA intent; year-end timing aligns with typical label-update cycles.

predictions.text: The U.S. 3M–10Y Treasury yield spread will steepen by at least 20 bps between 2025-11-07 close and any FRED observation on or before 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using FRED series DGS3MO and DGS10: (DGS10−DGS3MO) on any observation dated 2025-11-10 through 2025-11-30 is ≥20 bps higher than the spread on 2025-11-07.
predictions.rationale: Lower front-end expectations and heavy supply can jointly steepen the curve, but moves may be constrained.

predictions.text: U.S. Retail Sales control group (ex autos, gas, building materials, and food services) MoM SA for October 2025 will print between -0.2% and +0.2% in the advance report due mid-November.
predictions.verification_criteria: Census Bureau advance monthly retail trade press release for October 2025 shows control group MoM SA within [-0.2%, +0.2%].
predictions.rationale: Mixed spending backdrop with SNAP headwinds and disinflation argues for a flat control-group print.

predictions.text: ERCOT daily peak load will reach at least 65,000 MW on at least one day between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-10 (U.S. dates).
predictions.verification_criteria: ERCOT public dashboards or official daily reports show system peak load ≥65,000 MW on any date within the window.
monitoring_signals: Cold front forecasts and heating degree days
predictions.rationale: Early-season cold snaps can drive notable winter peaks, though typically below summer highs.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, at least one top-10 U.S. card issuer will announce a reduction in credit-card rewards value (earn rate cut, category cap, or higher redemption prices).
predictions.verification_criteria: A public issuer communication (press release, blog, or updated terms) from Amex, Chase, Citi, Capital One, BofA, Discover, Wells Fargo, U.S. Bank, Barclays, or Synchrony that clearly devalues consumer rewards.
monitoring_signals: Earnings calls guiding on interchange/rewards costs
predictions.rationale: Interchange pressure increases incentives to trim rewards economics.

predictions.text: Ethereum (ETH-USD) will trade at or above $3,600 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Intraday high on a major exchange (e.g., Coinbase or Bitstamp) ≥$3,600, confirmed by CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko, on any UTC day through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Macro risk sentiment and USD moves
predictions.rationale: Crypto beta tends to follow BTC breakouts; macro easing expectations support risk assets.

predictions.text: EIA will report at least one weekly U.S. propane/propylene stock change of -2.0 million barrels or more (draw) by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report shows U.S. propane/propylene stocks weekly change ≤ -2.0 million barrels in any report released by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Heating degree days and cold snaps
Petrochemical cracker outages or run rates
predictions.rationale: Seasonal draws accelerate with colder weather and steady exports.

predictions.text: The FOMC will cut the federal funds target range by 25 bps at its December 2025 meeting (announcement by 2025-12-12).
predictions.verification_criteria: Federal Reserve press release shows the target range lowered by 0.25 percentage point relative to the prior meeting, published on or before 2025-12-12.
monitoring_signals: Core inflation and labor data prints
predictions.rationale: Communication has shifted dovish; growth and inflation trends support a first cut.
